TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Login extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 提供用户界面 (UI) 元素以便登录网站。

span.span: Provides user interface (UI) elements for logging in to a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [样式和模板Style and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是提供对 Web 站点上的用户进行身份验证所需所有常见 UI 元素的复合控件。The control is a composite control that provides all the common UI elements needed to authenticate a user on a Web site. 以下三个元素所需的所有登录方案：The following three elements are required for all login scenarios: - 用于标识用户的唯一用户名。A unique user name to identify the user. - 要验证的用户标识的密码。A password to verify the identity of the user. - 用于向服务器发送的登录信息的登录按钮。A login button to send the login information to the server. 控件还提供了支持其他函数的以下可选 UI 元素：The control also provides the following optional UI elements that support additional functions: - 密码提示的链接。A link for a password reminder. - 记住我的复选框保留会话之间的登录信息。A Remember Me checkbox for retaining the login information between sessions. - 遇到问题中的日志记录的用户帮助链接。A Help link for users who are having trouble logging in. - 将用户重定向到注册页注册新的用户链接。A Register New User link that redirects users to a registration page. - 登录窗体显示的说明文本。Instruction text that appears on the login form. - 当用户而不填充用户名称或密码字段中单击登录按钮时显示的自定义错误文本。Custom error text that appears when the user clicks the login button without filling in the user name or password fields. - 显示登录失败时的自定义错误文本。Custom error text that appears if the login fails. - 登录成功时，会发生的自定义操作。A custom action that occurs when login succeeds. - 隐藏登录控件，如果用户已登录到该站点的方法。A way to hide the login control if the user is already logged in to the site. 显示哪些控件为必选和可选的表，请参阅属性。For a table showing which controls are required and which are optional, see property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100))然后再继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受用户输入是潜在的安全威胁。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以发送数据旨在暴露安全漏洞，或运行程序，请尝试生成的密码。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用您的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，并[保护成员资格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). 控件使用成员资格提供程序来获取用户凭据。The control uses a membership provider to obtain user credentials. 除非另行指定，否则控件使用 Web.config 文件中定义的默认成员资格提供程序。Unless you specify otherwise, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file. 若要指定不同的提供程序，设置应用程序的 Web.config 文件中定义的一个成员资格提供程序名称属性。To specify a different provider, set the property to one of the membership provider names defined in your application's Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。For more information, see [Membership Providers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f). 如果你想要使用自定义身份验证服务，则可以使用方法来调用服务。If you want to use a custom authentication service, you can use the method to call the service. ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 外观控件是通过模板和样式设置完全可自定义。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates and style settings. UI 文本的所有消息都都还可自定义的属性通过类。All UI text messages are also customizable through properties of the class. 默认接口文本自动根据服务器上的区域设置进行本地化。The default interface text is automatically localized based on the locale setting on the server. 如果控件自定义模板，则属性和属性将被忽略。If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在这种情况下，设置属性和直接每个模板子控件的属性。In this case, set the property and the property of each template child control directly. 控制属性，如由文本框中，表示和，页面生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 该控件将选取任何通过最终用户所做的更改由文本框触发的事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. > [!NOTE] > 如果在嵌入控制对象，显式设置中的属性`Page_Load`事件处理程序，当用户进行身份验证。If you embed the control in a object, explicitly set the property in a `Page_Load` event handler if the user is authenticated. 控件应自动前移到下一个在此方案中的对象。The control does not automatically advance to the next object in this scenario. 下表列出了控件的样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些 UI 元素。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 每个样式应用到哪些属性的列表，请参阅单独的样式属性的文档。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |样式属性Style property|受影响的用户界面元素UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||控件内容与控件的边框之间的间距。The space between the control contents and the control's border.| ||记住我复选框。Remember Me checkbox.| ||登录失败文本。Login failure text.| ||指示用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段，例如文本框的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文本输入的输入的字段。Text entry input fields.| ||标题文本。Title text.| ||由于验证错误而未成功登录尝试时向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when a login attempt is unsuccessful due to validation errors.| ||其他页面的链接。Links to other pages.| ||登录按钮。Login button.| ## 验证分组Validation Groupings 并属性具有可以阻止用户且不提供所需的信息提交页与其关联的控件。The and properties have controls associated with them to prevent users from submitting the page without providing required information. 控件，以便与相同的页面上的其他字段使用的验证组单独验证控件。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 默认情况下属性的控件用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，具有 ID"Login1"控件将使用"Login1"的验证组名称。For example, a control with the ID "Login1" will use a validation group name of "Login1". 如果你想要设置的验证组，控件的一部分，您必须将控件模板和更改的验证组名称。If you want to set the validation group that the control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name. ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控制，可以在标记中指定的 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果使用模板的外观进行自定义控件，您可以在模板中标记中指定的 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 可以防止表通过设置呈现属性设置为`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                    ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要为登录到网站上提供一个 UI 控件。The following code example uses a control to provide a UI for logging in to a Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginClass/CS/loginclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginClass/VB/loginclassvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展控件。The following code example demonstrates how you can extend the control. `CustomLogin`控件包括控件，以便用户可以选择使用进行身份验证的成员资格提供程序。The `CustomLogin` control includes a control that lets users choose which membership provider they are authenticated with. （这些提供程序是在 Web.config 中配置。）在中方法，属性设置为的所选值控件。(These providers are configured in Web.config.) In the method, the property is set to the selected value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin/CS/FarmasLogin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin/VB/FarmasLogin.vb#1)]

summary.span: 验证用户的身份后出现。

span.span: Occurs when a user is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户使用时引发事件中登录到网站上的控件。The event is raised when a user uses the control to log in to a Web site. 可以使用自定义身份验证方案事件用户进行身份验证。Custom authentication schemes can use the event to authenticate users. > [!NOTE] > 当用户使用控件中登录到网站时，视图状态中的所有数据和所有 post 数据会丢失。When a user uses the control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost. 不执行中的操作根据视图状态的事件。Do not perform actions in the event that rely on the view state. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件以调用特定于站点的自定义身份验证代码。The following code example uses the event to call site-specific custom authentication code. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginAuthenticate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAuthenticate/CS/loginauthenticatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginAuthenticate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAuthenticate/VB/loginauthenticatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对引用对象，用于更改的外观控件的记住我复选框。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of the control's Remember Me check box. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以以声明方式设置这些属性在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在窗体中以编程方式设置属性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义背景颜色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义的外观属性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 样式设置属性的样式设置与合并控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下重写的控件样式属性设置：The following control style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当您使用模板来定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的文本颜色的记住我复选框为蓝色和字体样式为斜体通过设置的属性所引用对象属性。The following code example sets the text color of the Remember Me check box to blue and the font style to italic by setting properties of the object referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginCheckBoxStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCheckBoxStyle/CS/logincheckboxstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginCheckBoxStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCheckBoxStyle/VB/logincheckboxstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含指向该站点的注册页链接的文本。The property contains the text of a link to the registration page for the site. 中指定的注册页 URL属性。The URL of the registration page is specified in the property. 如果为空中的文本属性显示给用户，但不是为链接格式。If is empty, the text in the property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link. 如果属性为空，注册页面的链接不是可供用户使用。If the property is empty, a link to the registration page is not available to the user. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为"注册新的用户..."The following code example sets the property to "Register new user..." > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的登录尝试成功时显示的网页。The property specifies the page that is displayed when a login attempt is successful. 默认行为控件是将用户返回到引用的页面，或定义中的页`defaultUrl`的 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性。The default behavior of the control is to return the user to the referring page, or to the page defined in the `defaultUrl` attribute of the element in the Web.config file. 属性重写的默认行为控件，并将`defaultUrl`配置文件中进行设置。The property overrides the default behavior of the control, as well as the `defaultUrl` setting made in the configuration file. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性。The following code example sets the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`中, 包含的文本属性显示在页上，以及记住我复选框。When the property is set to `true`, the text contained in the property is displayed on the page, along with a Remember Me check box. 当用户选择记住我复选框，发送到他 / 她的计算机的身份验证 cookie 仍然存在，以便自动在以后访问该站点上进行身份验证用户。When the user selects the Remember Me check box, the authentication cookie sent to his or her computer persists so that the user is automatically authenticated on future visits to the site. 值属性设置的所选内容中记住我复选框。The value of the property is set by the selection in the Remember Me check box. 如果是`false`、 记住我复选框不会显示在页面和用户是否在身份验证 cookie 仍然存在或不具有不能控制。If is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie persists or not. 您仍可以设置属性设置为`true`到用户的浏览器发送持久性身份验证 cookie，而不显示复选框。You can still set the property to `true` to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser without displaying the check box. > [!NOTE] > 没有与用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 的固有安全风险。There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser. 您应确定这些安全风险是可接受你的站点。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. 如果您设置属性设置为`true`并属性设置为`false`、 从公共浏览器中，如下所示咖啡馆例如，可以意外地留下持久身份验证 cookie 的 Internet 访问你的网站的用户和下一步的浏览器的用户将能够访问你的网站以使用上一个用户的凭据。If you set the property to `true` and the property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的登录尝试失败时显示的字符串。The property specifies the string that is displayed when a login attempt fails. 如果定义的模板控件，您可以指示位置上显示的模板属性使用控件并提供相关的控件 ID"FailureText"。If you define a template for the control, you can indicate where on the template to display the property by using a control and giving that control the ID "FailureText". 当您使用模板属性不应用于在指定的文本属性。When you use a template, the property is not applied to the text specified in the property. 该属性的默认文本根据服务器的当前区域设置本地化。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale. > [!NOTE] > 出于安全原因，登录名失败文本不应包括失败的特定原因。For security reasons, the login failure text should not include a specific reason for the failure. 例如，如一条错误消息"用户的密码无效\<用户名 >"显示给潜在的攻击者的\<用户名 > 是在系统上的用户。For example, an error message such as "Password not valid for user \" reveals to a potential attacker that \ is a user on the system. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 显示安全错误消息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)。For more information, see [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为"出错时中的日志记录你。The following code example sets the property to "There was an error while logging you in. 请重试。"。Please try again.". remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对对象，用于更改登录名失败文本的外观。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of login failure text. 默认值为以红色显示的文本。The default is to display the text in red. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以以声明方式设置这些属性在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在窗体中以编程方式设置属性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义背景颜色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义的外观属性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 样式设置属性的样式设置与合并控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下重写的控件样式属性设置：The following control style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当您使用模板来定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置背景和文本的颜色属性指定的登录名失败文本样式中所引用对象属性。The following code example specifies the login failure text style by setting the background and text color properties of the object referenced in the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含模板，它定义如何控件显示给用户。The property contains the template that defines how the control is displayed to the user. 下表列出了必需和可选控制中用控件模板。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in a control template. |ID 或命令名称ID or command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|任何实现控件，其中包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必需Required| |`Password`|任何实现控件，其中包括，或自定义或第三方控件。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必需Required| |`RememberMe`||OptionalOptional| |`FailureText`|任何实现控件。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`Login`|导致事件冒泡任何控件。Any control that causes event bubbling.|OptionalOptional| 控件将引发异常如果布局模板不包含所需的控制。The control throws an exception if the layout template does not contain the required controls. 如果可选控件 ID 向错误类型; 的控件，不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将忽略由控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 登录名控件可以如导致事件冒泡，任何控件， ，或。The login control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为"登录"。The control's command name property must be set to "Login". 当模板用于控件时，只有以下属性会影响该控件的行为：When a template is used for the control, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 所有属性都继承自。All properties inherited from . (有关详细信息，请参阅控制成员表。)(For details, see the control members table.) - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. 为设置模板时，所有其他属性处于非活动状态控件。All other properties are inactive when a template is set for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个模板，用于控件。The following code example creates a template for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 在用户登录到网站并进行身份验证后出现。

span.span: Occurs when the user logs in to the Web site and has been authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证提供程序将检查用户的凭据和身份验证 cookie 排队等待发送到浏览器中的下一步的响应后引发事件。The event is raised after the authentication provider checks the user's credentials and the authentication cookie is queued to send to the browser in the next response. 使用事件，以便提供其他处理，例如用户进行身份验证后访问每个用户数据。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as accessing per-user data, after the user is authenticated. 当用户提交他或她的登录信息，控件首先引发事件，则事件，并最后事件。When a user submits his or her login information, the control first raises the event, then the event, and finally the event. > [!NOTE] > 当用户使用控件中登录到网站时，视图状态中的所有数据和所有 post 数据会丢失。When a user uses the control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost. 不执行中的操作根据视图状态的事件。Do not perform actions in the event that rely on the view state. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来调用记录的用户登录名的特定于站点的方法。The following code example uses the event to call a site-specific method that keeps a record of user logins. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginAfterLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAfterLogin/CS/loginafterlogincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginAfterLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAfterLogin/VB/loginafterloginvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在用户未进行身份验证而提交登录信息时出现。

span.span: Occurs when a user submits login information, before authentication takes place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户提交登录信息但之前对用户进行身份在网站上引发事件。The event is raised when a user submits login information but before the user is authenticated on the Web site. 使用事件来设置对用户进行身份验证之前需要的任何信息。Use the event to set up any information that you need before authenticating a user. 您可以取消登录尝试期间通过设置事件的属性对象传递给`true`。You can cancel a login attempt during the event by setting the property of the object to `true`. 之后引发事件时，控件将引发事件，然后事件。After the event is raised, the control raises the event and then the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件，以确保用户输入中的格式正确的电子邮件地址属性。The following code example uses the event to ensure that the user has entered a well-formed email address in the property. 如果没有，则事件取消的登录尝试，并显示错误消息使用属性。If not, the event cancels the login attempt and displays an error message using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含显示的文本控件的登录按钮。The property contains the text displayed for the control's login button. 具体取决于值属性，属性可以显示为上一个按钮的文本的文本显示为图像无法呈现图像的浏览器中的替代方法或链接的文本。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表描述了如何不同值会影响属性。The following table describes how the different values affect the property. | 设置 setting|如何将使用属性。How the property is used.| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||为按钮的`Text`属性。As the button's `Text` property.| ||作为图像的替换文本。As alternative text for the image.| ||为链接文本。As link text.| 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在文本属性的值受到属性。The following code example shows how the text in the property is affected by the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 使用事件以实现自定义身份验证方案。Use the event to implement a custom authentication scheme. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件以调用特定于站点的自定义身份验证代码。The following code example uses the event to call site-specific custom authentication code. In the method, the property is set to the selected value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，发送到用户的计算机的身份验证 cookie 被设置为过期 50 年来，使其将在用户下次访问网站时使用的持久性 cookie。When the property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's computer is set to expire in 50 years, making it a persistent cookie that will be used when the user next visits the Web site. 由于身份验证 cookie 将存在于用户的计算机上，用户将被视为已通过身份验证，将无需再次登录到网站。Because the authentication cookie will be present on the user's computer, the user will be considered already authenticated and will not have to log in to the Web site again. 当属性是`true`，则属性设置为向用户显示的复选框的值。When the property is `true`, the property is set to the value of the check box displayed to the user. 如果属性是`false`、 记住我复选框不会显示在页面和用户具有不能控制是否是持久性的身份验证 cookie。If the property is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie is persistent. 如果属性是`true`，身份验证 cookie 发送到用户的浏览器将为持久性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's browser will be a persistent cookie. 如果用户从网站上使用注销控制持久性 cookie 清除从用户的计算机和用户将需要在下一步访问登录到站点。If the user logs out of the Web site using the control, the persistent cookie is cleared from the user's computer and the user will have to log in to the site on the next visit. > [!NOTE] > 没有与用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 的固有安全风险。There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser. 您应确定这些安全风险是可接受你的站点。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. 如果您设置属性设置为`true`并属性设置为`false`、 从公共浏览器中，如下所示咖啡馆例如，可以意外地留下持久身份验证 cookie 的 Internet 访问你的网站的用户和下一步的浏览器的用户将能够访问你的网站以使用上一个用户的凭据。If you set the property to `true` and the property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义的用户名和密码外观中的控件控件。The property defines the appearance of the User name and Password controls in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以以声明方式设置这些属性在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在窗体中以编程方式设置属性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义背景颜色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义的用户名称和密码文本框的外观。The property defines the appearance of the user name and password text boxes. 样式设置属性的样式设置与合并控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下重写的样式属性设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当您使用模板来定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的用户名和密码的背景和文本颜色按设置的属性的控件所引用对象属性。The following code example sets the background and text colors of the User name and Password controls by setting properties on the object referenced by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对引用对象，用来更改标题中包含的外观属性。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of the title contained in the property. 属性定义中的标题的外观控件。The property defines the appearance of the title in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性对象返回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 你可以以声明方式设置这些属性在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性类 (例如， `TitleStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TitleStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在窗体中以编程方式设置属性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TitleStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TitleStyle.ForeColor`). 常用的设置包括自定义背景颜色、 文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义的外观属性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 样式设置属性的样式设置与合并控件。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在中所做的任何设置属性重写的属性中的相应设置控件。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下重写的样式属性设置：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 当您使用模板来定义的外观控件，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置的属性来设置文本颜色、 背景色和标题的字体粗细所引用对象属性。The following code example sets the text color, background color, and font weight of the title by setting properties of the object referenced by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在显示的错误消息登录页上的控件。The property contains the error message displayed in a control on the login page. 属性值仅在满足以下条件时显示：The property value is displayed only when both the following conditions are true: - 一个控件是存在于页面上。A control is present on the page. - 用户名文本框留空用户。The User name text box is left blank by the user. 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 同时并值都包装在中的验证组控件。Both the and values are wrapped in a validation group within the control. 若要显示，这些值的属性控件必须设置为属性的控件。For these values to display, the property of the control must be set to the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用控件来显示错误消息中指定属性。The following code example demonstrates using a control to display the error message specified in the property. summary.span: 获取对 属性集合的引用，这些属性定义与 控件使用的验证程序关联的错误消息的外观。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error messages associated with validators used by the control.
A containing the style settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用于使用自定义的样式设置属性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|错误消息的背景颜色。The color behind the error messages. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|错误消息周围边框的颜色。The color of the border around the error messages. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|错误消息周围的边框样式。The style of the border around the error messages. 此样式可以是"None"、"点线"、"虚线"、"纯色"、"双线"、"Groove"、"凸线"、"Inset"或"开始"。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 默认值为"NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些样式不清楚地显示除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|错误消息周围边框的宽度。The width of the border around the error messages.| |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error messages. 如果指定了其他设置，这些值将覆盖样式表设置。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗体显示的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜体显示的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要显示错误消息文本中使用它上面的行。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|作为错误消息中的文本的大小对象。The size of the text in the error messages as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要显示的错误消息文本为带删除线。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要显示带下划线的错误消息文本。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|中的错误消息的文本的颜色。The color of the text in the error messages. 颜色可以是任何属性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|一个对象，表示错误消息的高度。A object that represents the height of the error messages.| |`Width`|一个对象，表示错误消息的宽度。A object that represents the width of the error messages.|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在验证用户身份后是否显示 控件。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否向经过身份验证的用户显示控件。The property specifies whether the control is displayed to authenticated users. 当该属性是`false`，则身份验证的用户访问站点时，控件不会出现在页面上。When the property is `false`, the control does not appear on the page when an authenticated user accesses the site. 这使用作为登录页和信息页面隐藏的网页上使用后用户已经过身份验证控制。This is used on Web pages that are used both as login pages and as information pages to hide the control after the user has been authenticated. 属性不起任何作用显示默认登录页上的控件定义 Web.config 中或在应用程序的配置文件。The property has no effect on a control that appears on the default login page defined in Web.config or in the application's configuration file. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为`true`以指定控件未隐藏，并且始终显示在页面上，而不考虑用户是否已经过身份验证。The following code example sets the property to `true` to specify that the control is not hidden and is always displayed on the page, regardless of whether the user has been authenticated. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginHideWhenLoggedIn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginHideWhenLoggedIn/CS/loginhidewhenloggedincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginHideWhenLoggedIn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginHideWhenLoggedIn/VB/loginhidewhenloggedinvb.aspx#1)]
